posts.post_title: Down to 3... WTB T206 Seymour Throwing.. Blank Back, Drum, Lenox.. Paying $$$
posts.post_content:
Will pay top dollar for these 3 cards. They are the last 3 I need to complete my back collection. I need your help. 

PLease email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if you have any of these 3 ..

jamie

Any Takers?
Jamie
